verses.arabic: الۤرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَایَـٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانࣲ مُّبِینࣲ
verses.translation: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
verses.transliteration: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabi wa Qur-aa-nim Mubeen

verses.arabic: رُّبَمَا یَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوۡ كَانُوا۟ مُسۡلِمِینَ
verses.translation: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
verses.transliteration: Rubamaa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen

verses.arabic: ذَرۡهُمۡ یَأۡكُلُوا۟ وَیَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ وَیُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ یَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
verses.transliteration: Zarhum yaakuloo wa tatamatta'oo wa yulhihimul amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon

verses.arabic: وَمَاۤ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡیَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابࣱ مَّعۡلُومࣱ
verses.translation: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa wa lahaa kitaabum ma'loom

verses.arabic: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا یَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ
verses.translation: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
verses.transliteration: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِی نُزِّلَ عَلَیۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونࣱ
verses.translation: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
verses.transliteration: Wa qaaloo yaaa aiyuhal lazee nuzzila 'alaihiz Zikru innaka lamajnoon

verses.arabic: لَّوۡ مَا تَأۡتِینَا بِٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِینَ
verses.translation: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
verses.transliteration: Law maa taateenaa bil malaaa'ikati in kunta minas saadiqeen

verses.arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوۤا۟ إِذࣰا مُّنظَرِینَ
verses.translation: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
verses.transliteration: Maa nunazzilul malaaa'i kata illaa bilhaqqi wa maa kaanooo izam munzareen

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
verses.transliteration: Innaa Nahnu nazalnaz Zikra wa Innaa lahoo lahaa fizoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِی شِیَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
verses.translation: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il awwaleen

verses.arabic: وَمَا یَأۡتِیهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ یَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
verses.translation: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

verses.arabic: كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نَسۡلُكُهُۥ فِی قُلُوبِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ
verses.translation: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
verses.transliteration: kazaalika naslukuhoo fee quloobil mujrimeen

verses.arabic: لَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
verses.translation: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
verses.transliteration: Laa yu'minoona bihee wa qad khalat sunnatul awwaleen

verses.arabic: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَیۡهِم بَابࣰا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ فَظَلُّوا۟ فِیهِ یَعۡرُجُونَ
verses.translation: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
verses.transliteration: Wa law fatahnaa 'alaihim baabam minas samaaa'i fazaloo feehi ya'rujoon

verses.arabic: لَقَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَـٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمࣱ مَّسۡحُورُونَ
verses.translation: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
verses.transliteration: Laqaaloo innamaa sukkirat absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmum mashooroon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِی ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ بُرُوجࣰا وَزَیَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِینَ
verses.translation: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad ja'alnaa fissamaaa'i buroojanw wa zaiyannaahaa linnaazireen

verses.arabic: وَحَفِظۡنَـٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَیۡطَـٰنࣲ رَّجِیمٍ
verses.translation: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
verses.transliteration: Wa hafiznaahaa min kulli Shaitaanir rajeem

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابࣱ مُّبِینࣱ
verses.translation: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
verses.transliteration: Illaa manis taraqas sam'a fa atba'ahoo shihaabum mubeen

verses.arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَـٰهَا وَأَلۡقَیۡنَا فِیهَا رَوَ ٰ⁠سِیَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِیهَا مِن كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ مَّوۡزُونࣲ
verses.translation: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
verses.transliteration: Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min kulli shai'im mawzoon

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِیهَا مَعَـٰیِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَ ٰ⁠زِقِینَ
verses.translation: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha wa mal lastum lahoo biraaziqeen

verses.arabic: وَإِن مِّن شَیۡءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَاۤىِٕنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥۤ إِلَّا بِقَدَرࣲ مَّعۡلُومࣲ
verses.translation: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
verses.transliteration: Wa im min shai'in illaa 'indanaa khazaaa 'inuhoo wa maa nunazziluhooo illaa biqadarim ma'loom

verses.arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّیَـٰحَ لَوَ ٰ⁠قِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ مَاۤءࣰ فَأَسۡقَیۡنَـٰكُمُوهُ وَمَاۤ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَـٰزِنِینَ
verses.translation: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
verses.transliteration: Wa arsalnar riyaaha la waaqiha fa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa asqai naakumoohu wa maaa antum lahoo bikhaazineen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡیِۦ وَنُمِیتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَ ٰ⁠رِثُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
verses.transliteration: Wa innnaa la nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa nahnul waarisoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِینَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِینَ
verses.translation: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
verses.transliteration: Wa la qad 'alimnal mustaqdimeena minkum wa laqad 'alimnal mustaakhireen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ یَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِیمٌ عَلِیمࣱ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; innahoo Hakeem 'Aleem

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَـٰلࣲ مِّنۡ حَمَإࣲ مَّسۡنُونࣲ
verses.translation: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min salsaalim min hama im masnoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلۡجَاۤنَّ خَلَقۡنَـٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.translation: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
verses.transliteration: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris samoom

verses.arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةِ إِنِّی خَـٰلِقُۢ بَشَرࣰا مِّن صَلۡصَـٰلࣲ مِّنۡ حَمَإࣲ مَّسۡنُونࣲ
verses.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
verses.transliteration: Wa iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa' ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min salsaalim min hama im masnoon

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّیۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِیهِ مِن رُّوحِی فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِینَ
verses.translation: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
verses.transliteration: Fa izaa sawwaituhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen

verses.arabic: فَسَجَدَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةُ كُلُّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعُونَ
verses.translation: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
verses.transliteration: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon

verses.arabic: إِلَّاۤ إِبۡلِیسَ أَبَىٰۤ أَن یَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِینَ
verses.translation: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
verses.transliteration: Illaaa ibleesa abaaa ai yakoona ma'as saajideen

verses.arabic: قَالَ یَـٰۤإِبۡلِیسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِینَ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala yaaa Ibleesu maa laka allaa takoona ma'as saajideen

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَمۡ أَكُن لِّأَسۡجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن صَلۡصَـٰلࣲ مِّنۡ حَمَإࣲ مَّسۡنُونࣲ
verses.translation: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
verses.transliteration: Qaala lam akul li asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim min hama im masnoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِیمࣱ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
verses.transliteration: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa innaka rajeem

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَیۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ یَوۡمِ ٱلدِّینِ
verses.translation: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
verses.transliteration: Wa inna 'alikal la'nata ilaa Yawmid Deen

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِیۤ إِلَىٰ یَوۡمِ یُبۡعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi fa anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنظَرِینَ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
verses.transliteration: Qaala fa innaka minal munzareen

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ یَوۡمِ ٱلۡوَقۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡلُومِ
verses.translation: Until the Day of the time well-known."
verses.transliteration: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَاۤ أَغۡوَیۡتَنِی لَأُزَیِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِیَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِینَ
verses.translation: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
verses.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa aghwaitanee la uzayyinaana lahum fil ardi wa la ughwiyan nahum ajma'een

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنۡهُمُ ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِینَ
verses.translation: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
verses.transliteration: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذَا صِرَ ٰ⁠طٌ عَلَیَّ مُسۡتَقِیمٌ
verses.translation: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
verses.transliteration: Qaala haaza Siraatun 'alaiya Mustaqeem

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِی لَیۡسَ لَكَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَـٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِینَ
verses.translation: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
verses.transliteration: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaanun illaa manittaba'aka minal ghaaween

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوۡعِدُهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِینَ
verses.translation: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna jahannama lamaw'iduhum ajma'een

verses.arabic: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَ ٰ⁠بࣲ لِّكُلِّ بَابࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءࣱ مَّقۡسُومٌ
verses.translation: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
verses.transliteration: Lahaa sab'atu abwaab; likulli baabim minhum juz'um maqsoom

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَعُیُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
verses.transliteration: Innal muttaqeena fee Jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

verses.arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ءَامِنِینَ
verses.translation: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
verses.transliteration: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin aamineen

verses.arabic: وَنَزَعۡنَا مَا فِی صُدُورِهِم مِّنۡ غِلٍّ إِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرࣲ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِینَ
verses.translation: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
verses.transliteration: Wa naza'naa ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim mutaqaabileen

verses.arabic: لَا یَمَسُّهُمۡ فِیهَا نَصَبࣱ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِینَ
verses.translation: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
verses.transliteration: Laa yamas suhum feehaa nasabunw wa maa hum minhaa bimukhrajeen

verses.arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِیۤ أَنِّیۤ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِیمُ
verses.translation: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Nabbi' 'ibaadeee annneee anal Ghafoorur Raheem

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِی هُوَ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ٱلۡأَلِیمُ
verses.translation: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
verses.transliteration: Wa anna 'azaabee uwal 'azaabul aleem

verses.arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ عَن ضَیۡفِ إِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ
verses.translation: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
verses.transliteration: Wa nabbi'hum 'an daifi Ibraaheem

verses.arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَیۡهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمࣰا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمۡ وَجِلُونَ
verses.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
verses.transliteration: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala innaa minkum wajiloon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِیمࣲ
verses.translation: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo la tawjal innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِی عَلَىٰۤ أَن مَّسَّنِیَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala abashshartumoonee 'alaaa am massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashshiroon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرۡنَـٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَـٰنِطِینَ
verses.translation: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum minal qaaniteen

verses.arabic: قَالَ وَمَن یَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦۤ إِلَّا ٱلضَّاۤلُّونَ
verses.translation: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala wa mai yaqnatu mir rahmati Rabbiheee illad daaaloon

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَیُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
verses.transliteration: Qaala famaa khatbukum aiyuhal mursaloon

verses.arabic: قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّاۤ أُرۡسِلۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمࣲ مُّجۡرِمِینَ
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen

verses.arabic: إِلَّاۤ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِینَ
verses.translation: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
verses.transliteration: Illaaa Aala Loot; innaa lamunajjoohum ajma'een

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَاۤ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَـٰبِرِینَ
verses.translation: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
verses.transliteration: Illam ra atahoo qaddarnaaa innahaa laminal ghaabireen

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاۤءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
verses.transliteration: Falamma jaaa'a Aala Lootinil mursaloon

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
verses.transliteration: Qaala innakum qawmum munkaroon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلۡ جِئۡنَـٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِیهِ یَمۡتَرُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon

verses.arabic: وَأَتَیۡنَـٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
verses.translation: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
verses.transliteration: Wa atainaaka bilhaqqi wa innaa lasaadiqoon

verses.arabic: فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِطۡعࣲ مِّنَ ٱلَّیۡلِ وَٱتَّبِعۡ أَدۡبَـٰرَهُمۡ وَلَا یَلۡتَفِتۡ مِنكُمۡ أَحَدࣱ وَٱمۡضُوا۟ حَیۡثُ تُؤۡمَرُونَ
verses.translation: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
verses.transliteration: Fa asri bi ahlika biqit'im minal laili wattabi' adbaarahum wa laa yaltafit minkum ahadunw wamdoo haisu tu'maroon

verses.arabic: وَقَضَیۡنَاۤ إِلَیۡهِ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ مَقۡطُوعࣱ مُّصۡبِحِینَ
verses.translation: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
verses.transliteration: Wa qadainaaa ilaihi zaalikal amra anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um musbiheen

verses.arabic: وَجَاۤءَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَدِینَةِ یَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ
verses.translation: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'a ahlul madeenati yastabshiroon

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ ضَیۡفِی فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ
verses.translation: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
verses.transliteration: Qaala inna haaa'ulaaa'i daifee falaa tafdahoon

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ
verses.translation: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
verses.transliteration: Wattaqul laaha wa laa tukhzoon

verses.arabic: قَالُوۤا۟ أَوَلَمۡ نَنۡهَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
verses.translation: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo awalam nanhaka 'anil 'aalameen

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ بَنَاتِیۤ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَـٰعِلِینَ
verses.translation: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
verses.transliteration: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee in kuntum faa'ileen

verses.arabic: لَعَمۡرُكَ إِنَّهُمۡ لَفِی سَكۡرَتِهِمۡ یَعۡمَهُونَ
verses.translation: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
verses.transliteration: La'amruka innahum lafee sakratihim ya'mahoon

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّیۡحَةُ مُشۡرِقِینَ
verses.translation: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
verses.transliteration: Fa akhazat humus saihatu mushriqeen

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَا عَـٰلِیَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةࣰ مِّن سِجِّیلٍ
verses.translation: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
verses.transliteration: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa amtamaa 'alaihim hijaaratam min sjijjeel

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ لَـَٔایَـٰتࣲ لِّلۡمُتَوَسِّمِینَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil lilmutawassimeen

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِیلࣲ مُّقِیمٍ
verses.translation: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
verses.transliteration: Wa innahaa labi sabeelim muqeem

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ لَـَٔایَةࣰ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika la Aayatal lilmu'mineen

verses.arabic: وَإِن كَانَ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡأَیۡكَةِ لَظَـٰلِمِینَ
verses.translation: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
verses.transliteration: Wa in kaana Ashaabul Aikati lazaalimeen

verses.arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامࣲ مُّبِینࣲ
verses.translation: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
verses.transliteration: Fantaqamnaa minhum wa innahumaa labi imaamim mubeen

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡحِجۡرِ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِینَ
verses.translation: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad kazzaba ashaabul Hijril mursaleen

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَیۡنَـٰهُمۡ ءَایَـٰتِنَا فَكَانُوا۟ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِینَ
verses.translation: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
verses.transliteration: Wa aatainaahum Aayaatinaa fakaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen

verses.arabic: وَكَانُوا۟ یَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُیُوتًا ءَامِنِینَ
verses.translation: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
verses.transliteration: Wa kaanoo yanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan aamineen

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّیۡحَةُ مُصۡبِحِینَ
verses.translation: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
verses.transliteration: Fa akhazat humus saihatu musbiheen

verses.arabic: فَمَاۤ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡسِبُونَ
verses.translation: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
verses.transliteration: Famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَیۡنَهُمَاۤ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَـَٔاتِیَةࣱۖ فَٱصۡفَحِ ٱلصَّفۡحَ ٱلۡجَمِیلَ
verses.translation: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqq; wa innas Saa'ata la aatiyatun fasfahis safhal jameel

verses.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِیمُ
verses.translation: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
verses.transliteration: Inna Rabbaka Huwal khallaaqul 'aleem

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَیۡنَـٰكَ سَبۡعࣰا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِی وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِیمَ
verses.translation: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad aatainaaka sab'am mnal masaanee wal Qur-aanal 'azeem

verses.arabic: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَیۡنَیۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِهِۦۤ أَزۡوَ ٰ⁠جࣰا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡ وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ
verses.translation: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
verses.transliteration: Laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa maa matta 'naa biheee azwaajam minhum wa laa tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu 'mineen

verses.arabic: وَقُلۡ إِنِّیۤ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِیرُ ٱلۡمُبِینُ
verses.translation: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
verses.transliteration: Wa qul inneee anan nazeerul mubeen

verses.arabic: كَمَاۤ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡمُقۡتَسِمِینَ
verses.translation: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
verses.transliteration: Kamaaa anzalnaa 'alal muqtasimeen

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ جَعَلُوا۟ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عِضِینَ
verses.translation: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
verses.transliteration: Allazeena ja'alul Quraana'ideen

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِینَ
verses.translation: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
verses.transliteration: Fawa Rabbika lanas'a lannahum ajma'een

verses.arabic: عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: About what they used to do.
verses.transliteration: 'Ammaa kaanoo ya'maloon

verses.arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ
verses.translation: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
verses.transliteration: Fasda' bimaa tu'maru wa a'rid anil mushrikeen

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَفَیۡنَـٰكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَهۡزِءِینَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
verses.transliteration: Innaa kafainaakal mustahzi'een

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ یَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ یَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
verses.transliteration: Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; fasawfa ya'lamoon

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ یَضِیقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا یَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad na'lamu annak yadeequ sadruka bimaa yaqooloon

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِینَ
verses.translation: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
verses.transliteration: Fasbbih bihamdi Rabbika wa kum minas saajideen

verses.arabic: وَٱعۡبُدۡ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ یَأۡتِیَكَ ٱلۡیَقِینُ
verses.translation: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
verses.transliteration: Wa'bud Rabbaka hattaa yaatiyakal yaqeen
